document_data.name: Kal Clewsoro
document_data.mainbody: '''Kal Clewsoro''' ran a camp near [[Spellgard]] in [[1479 DR]].
document_data.History: Clewsoro started as a soldier, later becoming a teamster and rising to become a merchant prince. In [[1477 DR]], he traveled to [[Spellgard]] seeking Lady [[Saharel]]'s counsel. He did not trust the [[Monastery of the Precipice]] and established a private camp near the ruin.
document_data.Personality: Clewsoro considered all fellow seekers possible rivals and did not trust strangers. He loved talking about himself.
